spirit:component.spirit:name: PCIe_BRDG_BD_debug_bridge_0_0
spirit:component.spirit:description: The Debug Bridge IP is used with Partial Reconfiguration based designs, Tandem with Field Updates design and with designs which needs to be debugged through SoftBscan by means of Xilinx Virtual Cable. In order to debug these designs, the Debug Bridge IP is required to provide a means for communicating with debug IP (including Memory IP) that is in the design.
